title: Isekai C-mart Hanjouki - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Carefree Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Dwarfs   Easy Going Life   Elves   Fantasy World   Gate to Another World   Loli   Male Protagonist   Merchants   Modern Day   Store Owner   Stubborn Protagonist   Technological Gap   Transported to Another World   Wealthy Characters
author: Araki Shin   新木伸
description:
Another World × Elf × Supermarket = I am the shopkeeper. The “shopkeeper” who “quit” that stress-filled reality and casually disappeared into another world.

I want to repay the kindness of the people in that other world! With an elf who I found collapsed on the road to help at the register, I, the shopkeeper, opened a small shop. The goods I have lined up are from modern society! Sugar and coffee, chainsaws, and plastic bags, today we’ll sell all we can!

Our another-world C-mart is full of customers, ranging from our neighbor “oba-chan” to children to dwarf smiths and even legendary adventurers!?

In my relaxed, slow life as shopkeeper, with a carefree attitude we’re open for business today as well!>
